open_PDF_option_description.message: Save a PDF of your document to your device. You can review your document before printing.

google_cloud_print_option_description.message: Print on paper using the selected cloud printer.

disabled_printer_option.description: Option shown when printer list is disabled.

default_printer_list_option.description: Default option shown in the printer list

add_google_cloud_printer.description: URL link to add the google cloud printer.

printing_support_warning_message.message: For printing to work, your IT administrator must install the Citrix PDF printer driver.
printing_support_warning_message.description: Warning message about printer setup in VDA

error_help_desk.message: Please contact your help desk with the following information: $1

error_file_extension.message: $app_name$ is not configured to open $file_type$ file type.
error_file_extension.description: Citrix receiver not configured to open unknown file extensions

error_app_open.description: Citrix receiver could not be opened

error_incorrect_url.message: Cannot connect to the server. Make sure the address is correct and that you've included "http://" or "https://". If you still can't connect, contact your help desk for assistance.

error_network_conn.message: Please check your network connectivity. Unable to reach "$sfUrl$"

connect_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to connect?

connect_URL_secure_msg.message: This connection to "$store_url$" is not secure. You should only proceed if you trust this server.
connect_URL_secure_msg.description: Message saying connection to a StoreFront/Web interface/Gateway url over http

secureMsg_preference.description: To hide the secure connection dialog automatically from next launch onwards

error_file_open_gdrive.message: $app_name$ can only open files from Google Drive.
error_file_open_gdrive.description: Error message saying files can only be opened from Google drive

CR_config_applied.description: CRA configured using default cr file

store_settings_change.message: $store$ settings would be applied after you close all the windows and restart $app_name$.
store_settings_change.description: Changing store url in settings page

add_store.message: Do you want to add "$storeName$" provided by "$sfUrl$"?

enumerate_res_error.message: Couldn't enumerate resources for the user.
enumerate_res_error.description: Couldn't enumerate resources for the user.

unauthorized_user_error.message: User is not logged in or authorized to access the data.
unauthorized_user_error.description: User is not logged in or authorized to access the data.

error_launch_generic.description: Citrix Receiver couldn't launch the session due to the error specified using errorMsg

errorMsg.example: The server refused a connection. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.

AppRemoved.message: The resource to launch no longer exists, is no longer enabled or is no longer visible to current user.
AppRemoved.description: The resource to launch no longer exists, is no longer enabled or is no longer visible to current user.

NoMoreActiveSessions.message: The user is not allowed any more active sessions. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.
NoMoreActiveSessions.description: The user is not allowed any more active sessions. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.

NotLicensed.message: The server does not have the required license to perform the requested activity.
NotLicensed.description: The server does not have the required license to perform the requested activity.

UnavailableDesktop.message: No workstations are available to service this request. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.
UnavailableDesktop.description: No workstations are available to service this request. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.

CouldNotConnectToWorkstation.message: The server refused a connection. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.
CouldNotConnectToWorkstation.description: The server refused a connection. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.

WorkstationInMaintenance.message: The requested workstation is in maintenance mode and cannot be used. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.
WorkstationInMaintenance.description: The requested workstation is in maintenance mode and cannot be used. Currently applies to XenDesktop only.

ResourceError.message: General error that cannot be further specified.
ResourceError.description: General error that cannot be further specified.

GeneralAppLaunchError.message: General error that cannot be further specified.
GeneralAppLaunchError.description: General error that cannot be further specified.

Unauthorized.message: The user is not logged in or authorized to access the data.
Unauthorized.description: The user is not logged in or authorized to access the data.

networkUnreachable.message: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your network and try again.

storeUnreachable.message: Cannot connect to the server. Please contact your help desk for assistance or check the server address in Account Settings.
storeUnreachable.description: When network and beacon are reachable but store urls are unreachable

beaconUnreachable.message: Cannot connect to the server. Please contact your help desk for assistance or check the server address in Account Settings.
beaconUnreachable.description: Network is present but beacons are unreachable.

offlinestatus.message: Cannot connect to network. Try again when your network is available.
offlinestatus.description: : When offline is detected and when network goes down.

policy_applied_config_fail.message: You cannot change this Receiver configuration. Your administrator is using policies to configure Receiver for you.
policy_applied_config_fail.description: CR configuration failure message when admin has configured using google policies

CRA_update_notification.message: A new version of $1 is available.
CRA_update_notification.description: New Chrome Receiver Update Available notification

CRA_restart_message.description: New CRA update Available notification message.

Button_Now.description: Now button for Chrome Receiver Update Available notification

Button_Later.description: Later button for Chrome Receiver Update Available notification

store_address_change.description: When the store address is changed in account settings page

urlPlaceholder.description: Watermark for URL field in Preferences page

thirdPartyLicenses.message: Receiver for Chrome Third Party Notices

http_error_code_403.message: Your credentials could not be verified.
http_error_code_403.description: When Authentication of user is failed.

http_error_code_404.message: Google Cloud Print server is not available. Try again later.

http_error_code_413.message: File is too large to print.
http_error_code_413.description: HTTP request size is larger than the size of the request accepted by the GCP server.

GCP_error_code_default.message: Google Cloud Print is not available. Try again later.

GCP_error_code_111.message: Printer not found. Please select another printer.
GCP_error_code_111.description: If printer trying to print to is not found.

GCP_error_code_403.description: When the file that is printing to GCP is corrupted.

GCP_no_printer_error.message: No printers are set up in Google Cloud Print. Please set one up now.
GCP_no_printer_error.description: If user account does not contain any printer attached his/her GCP this error is shown

add_print_job_to_queue.description: Adding the print job to queue

one_time_printer_setup_message.message: If you want to print with Google Cloud Print, you can set it up in Printer Settings.
one_time_printer_setup_message.description: One time message to user about printer setup.

connection_center_description.message: Select a session or an application to take action:
connection_center_description.description: Description of radio buttons in connection center

seamless_multimonitor_drop_here.message: Drag and drop here to move the session to this monitor
seamless_multimonitor_drop_here.description: Text displayed when moving seamless apps to different monitor

sendFeedback.description: Send Feedback link text in Account settings

multimonitorSettingsCheckboxLabel.message: Use all the monitors to span display

ceipSettingsCheckboxLabel.message: Help improve Receiver by sending anonymous usage statistics
